description: It's a chilly afternoon and Samuel O'Toole is getting cozy next to a roaring fire. He's just returned from a motorcycle ride in brisk mountain air. First his clothes must come off to feel the full intensity of the fire. Samuel knows that stroking one's cock can produce a rush of blood, which increases body temperature. It doesn't take a survival expert to know that a good jerk session is not only good for the body, but also for the mind. Tugging his nice, hard dick is helping Samuel stay alert and focused in this cold weather. And when that big load shoots, Samuel knows he's done a good job.   Enjoy!
title: Light My Fire
